title: TIER 0 POOL for all IDOs
body: Most of the biggest OM supporters would like to have at least a small guaranteed allocation even in the small IDOs where the pool would be 10-20k for them. Because of the biggest supporters of the network, they should always have their guaranteed part in the OM ecosystem.
choices: have TIER 0 pool for all IDOs
dont have pool for all IDOs
author: 0x16B942a59054186DC4C4067169FB126bd0f443dd
